item1.title: Automotive Industry Carbon Platform
item1.p1: AICP is the global, industry-level platform designed for long-term carbon emission performance traceability and visibility under the Net Zero commitment.
item1.p2: The platform offers public view mode and supply chain view mode (Digital<0>3</0> Carbon).

item2.title: Digital<0>3</0> Carbon
item2.p1: Digital<0>3</0> Carbon provides products and tools that helps authorized organizations in the automotive industry to view data in AICP, track carbon performance alongside its supply chain parties and operate with the AICP platform under certain permission.
